detail_desc: Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Sleeveless lace romper suit with a flounce around the neckline and press-studs at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist, press-studs at the crotch and narrow elastication around the legs. Lined.
Hooded top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a sculpting effect on the waist, seat and hips. High waist with laser-cut edges, wide lace at the sides and a lined gusset.
Wide, long-sleeved jumper in a soft, rib knit containing some wool.
Short cotton twill skirt with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and visible seams front and back.
Cold shoulder top in a soft viscose weave with an elasticated flounce that goes across the shoulders and an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Small, glittery shoulder bag with embroidery and appliqués. Flap with a hook and loop fastening and a narrow, glittery fabric shoulder strap with a press-stud at one end. Lined. Size 3x7x11 cm.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a small stand-up collar, V-neck, button placket and chest pocket. Gathered yoke at the back, gathered shoulder seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in a cotton weave. High, frilled collar with the frill continuing down the button placket. Buttons down the front, a yoke at the back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. The buttons are covered in rhinestones and beads.
Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed jersey.
Boxy shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, flap chest pockets and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back and short sleeves.
Three-strand bracelet of thin metal chains, two with coin-shaped pendants. Adjustable length 18-23 cm.
Elasticated scrunchie in woven fabric with a scarf detail.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles.
Hoodie in soft, warming faux shearling with a lined hood and zip at the top. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Semi-matte socks with a short shaft. 20 denier.
Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and long balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs.

Short, pile-lined parka in a cotton weave with padded sleeves, a stand-up collar and pile-lined hood with a detachable faux-fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a concealed pocket behind with a press-stud at the top. Elasticated tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and a small back vent. Lined.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif on the front and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Fitted, calf-length dress with a round neckline, long sleeves, a seam with draped detailing at the waist, and a gently flared skirt.
Short, fitted dress in stretch fabric with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Straight-cut dress in a soft, patterned weave with a wide neckline, long sleeves and softly draped front. Wide, sewn-on tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Oversized jacket in washed denim with worn details, a collar, dropped shoulders and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets, buttoned cuffs, and a tab with adjustable buttoning at the back. The jacket is made partly from recycled cotton.
Shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Satin-covered Alice band decorated with fabric flowers.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a deep V-neck at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with lace-trimmed asymmetric cuffs, slits in the sides and a lace trim at the hem.

Quilted, lightly padded nylon jacket with a lined drawstring hood and a zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring hem. Lined.
Slip-on, fabric trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Sleeveless top in soft cotton jersey with flounces at the top in a broderie anglaise weave.
5-pocket bootcut jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
Boxy jumper with a ribbed turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Small bag in imitation leather with a zip at the top and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Size 5x12.5x19 cm.
Longer, wide-fitting jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a deep neckline, short sleeves and covered, decorative buttons at the front.
V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with a gently rounded hem and long, cuffed sleeves with a covered button. Slightly longer at the back.
Short fitted dress in sturdy jersey. V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover at the front, long sleeves, a seam at the waist and decorative gathers in one side.
Small comfort blanket in soft velour and jersey with an animal-shaped head and paws. Polyester filling.
Short, gently fitted dress in woven fabric with a boat neck, concealed zip at the back, 3/4-length sleeves and wide cuffs with a slit and button. Unlined.
Bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow metal chain shoulder strap and flap with a metal edge and magnetic fastener. One zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 6x14x20 cm.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut sports top in fast-drying mesh with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Slides in imitation leather with twisted straps at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Fitted, hooded jacket in fast-drying, functional fabric with thermal fleece inside. Zip down the front, zipped front pockets and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs.
Wide V-neck blouse in a viscose weave with short sleeves and buttons down the front.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem.
Short padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Lined hood, a zip down the front, flap front pockets with press-studs, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in twill with a woven stripes and a light sheen. Notch lapels and jetted front pockets. Unlined.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a tie detail at the hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Classic T-shirt in soft, gently draping jersey made from a cotton and silk blend. Straight cut with short sleeves.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a satin bow at the top.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a frill trim at the front, low waist, narrow ties at the sides and high cut at the back.
Cotton jersey crop tops with narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.

Shirt in airy cotton poplin in a straight style with a gently tapered waist, turn-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with an unlined hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Trainers in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at the front and a padded top edge. Terry linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and ties at the hem.
Shorts in an airy weave. High, frill-trimmed paper bag waist with covered elastication, a zip fly and buttons, and flap leg pockets.
Shorts in lightweight cotton twill with a drawstring and belt loops at the waist, a zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt pocket with a button at the back.
Washed cotton twill trousers in a regular fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly deeper neckline, chest pocket and rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft jersey with long sleeves, and press-studs down the front and along one leg. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.

Gently tailored jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a covered button at the front and jetted front pockets. 3/4-length sleeves with a decorative button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, waffle-knit cotton with a small appliqué at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and metal front fastenings.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Jumper in chunky-knit organic cotton with a round neckline, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Shirt in an airy, patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a washed look. Elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a small embroidered detail on the chest. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cap in woven fabric with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
